  1. City Secretary

City Secretary

The City Secretary’s Office maintains all business and legal records, including City Council and board actions.

City Secretary

The City of Kennedale's City Secretary's Office received the Texas Municipal Clerk's Office Achievement of Excellence Award in 2025.
